DOC.brief_summary: This study design test standard mail intervention ( SI ) versus novel decision support navigation intervention ( DSNI ) . Working patient stakeholder , randomize trial include 400 Hispanic men woman 50 75 year age , patient community base primary care practice , eligible CRC screening . We consent , survey , randomize participant either SI Group ( n=200 ) DSNI Group ( n=200 ) . Study specific aim : ( 1 ) Assess intervention ( DSNI versus SI ) impact overall CRC screening adherence ; ( 2 ) Assess intervention ( DNSI versus SI ) impact CRC screen decision stage ; ( 3 ) Assess intervention ( DNSI versus SI ) impact test-specific CRC screening adherence ; ( 4 ) Assess intervention ( DNSI versus SI ) impact CRC knowledge perception .
DOC.brief_title: Increasing Colorectal Cancer ( CRC ) Screening Among Hispanic Primary Care Patients
